name: nvcli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ, c3 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr)
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ c1 ∈ c2
⊣ ((c3 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr)
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ c1 ∈ c2
⊣ ((c3 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c3 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(normCV ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr)
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ c1 ∈ c2
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(normCV ` c3)

comment: The norm of a normed complex vector space is a real number. (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
